decrease single_crochet in next 1 sts decrease 3 slip_stitch in the first stitch from previous round to join cut yarn and tie off repeat above steps for the second ear cover figure 3 copyright © 2022 anna lee hennin cat hat | 2 hennin cat hat | crochet pattern by anna lee back and neck round 3 face opening round chain 2 decrease double_crochet in next switch to color c place the ear covers upside-down 5 sts half_double_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet in next 3 sts chain 12 skip 26 sts single_crochet in next 3 sts half_double_crochet in next 5 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts decrease 40 28 sts 12 chs attach yarn to first st from the middle of ear cover on your left figure 4 round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in same st and next 12 sts half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in each of the 12 chs half_double_crochet in next st double_crochet in tip this is the st next to the last st joined from step next 13 sts 40 above in sew ear covers together round 5 chain 2 fpdc in same st *bpdc in next st fpdc figure 4 in next st* 6 times *bphdc in next st fphdc in next st* 7 times *bpdc in next st fpdc in next st* 6 times bpdc in last st 40 round 6-9 repeat round 5 cut yarn and tie off finishing up face opening attach yarn in any st chain 1 single_crochet in same st and around evenly 40 round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and next 13 sts 2 single_crochet in sew in all ends the space between the last st and next st figure 5 single_crochet in next 28 sts 2 single_crochet in the space between the last st and next st single_crochet in next
